amendatorysection.catchline: Adopted person; request for information; form.
amendatorysection.para: Except as otherwise provided in the Nebraska Indian Child Welfare Act, an adopted person twenty-five years of age or older born in this state who desires access to the names of relatives or access to his or her original certificate of birth shall file a written request for such information with the department. The department shall provide a form for making such a request.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Indian Child Welfare Act, see section 43-1501.
